name: Tribal Elegance
description: Tribal Elegance is a striking combination of matte black, creamy nude, and intricate hand-drawn tribal line art.

name: Romantic Reds
palette: Deep Romantic Red, Soft Nude/Pinkish Beige, Crisp White
description: Romantic Reds is an ode to classic romance, perfect for expressing affection and adding a touch of passionate elegance to your look.

name: Whimsical Greens
palette: Vibrant Greens, Soft Nude/Pinkish Beige, White, Dark Green/Brown Accents
description: Inspired by the vibrant hues of nature and the joy of geometric patterns, Whimsical Greens is a delightful blend of lively greens, soft neutrals, and charming details.
design_details: Polka dots, geometric criss-cross patterns, solid color blocks

name: Sweet Blossom
palette: Vibrant Red, Crisp White, Black (for flower centers)
description: This charming style brings a touch of playful elegance and floral fancy to your fingertips, perfect for embracing the beauty of spring and summer.

name: Rose Radiance
description: This enchanting style brings a sophisticated sparkle and delicate charm to your fingertips, perfect for adding a touch of feminine glamour to any occasion.
